hero.title: Independent Capital for the Age of Acceleration
hero.subtitle: The investment DAO engineered for centuries.

about.title: Institutional Intelligence, Protocol-Enforced
about.description: Open Libra is a sovereign, on-chain investment endowment designed to survive and thrive across centuries. We combine AI-driven strategy with cryptographically enforced governance to deliver transparent, trustworthy capital allocation in a rapidly evolving world.
about.mission: Blockhains as institutional vehicle: aligns rapid investment with immutable, programmable covenants — ensuring a resilient, purpose-driven legacy beyond typical timelines.

aboutHighlights.title: Century-Scale Time Horizon
aboutHighlights.description: Designed for perpetual existence, Open Libra's structure enables capital and mission to compound uninterrupted over 100+ years.

aboutHighlights.title: AI-Native
aboutHighlights.description: Our operations are agent-native. Engineering, communication, and governance are all optimized for AI augmentation. To understand AI, you must live in AI.

aboutHighlights.title: The endgame of institutional capital
aboutHighlights.description: A fund with a 100+ year mandate requires an execution layer immune to jurisdictional drift, key-man risk, and institutional fragility — only a dedicated blockchain can provide that level of neutrality and permanence.

foundation.title: Unstoppable & Trustworthy
foundation.description: Built on decentralized infrastructure, Open Libra operates beyond agency, jurisdictional, and custodial risks, providing an unforgeable record of capital. Investment DAOs are the endgame of blockchain.

foundation.title: A battle-tested open funding model
foundation.description: Capital is allocated through specialized sub-DAOs, enabling parallel innovation, risk containment, and governance specialization.

foundation.title: Main street common sense
foundation.description: Blockchain is not magical, it's table-stakes for independent capital. Capital must compound with rigor, transparency, and alignment to endure.

strategy.title: AI++ Strategy
strategy.description: Any institution looking over the horizon has only one mission: timing when AI disrupts each market.
focus: Long-term, future-facing technologies shaping AI and machine intelligence
Decentralized finance protocols with proven adoption
Infrastructure enabling AI and machine learning scalability
Technologies that enhance human dignity and sovereignty
riskManagement: Diversification across sectors, geographies, and protocol layers
Continuous AI-powered risk monitoring and scenario analysis
Programmatic enforcement of regulatory and mandate constraints
Mechanisms for long-term capital preservation and mission alignment

governance.title: Governance in service of perpetuity
governance.description: Open Libra employs a layered governance model combining decentralized sub-DAOs, AI-assisted decision support, and immutable on-chain voting to ensure durability, adaptability, and stakeholder alignment over generations.

documentation.title: A proud history of transparency
documentation.description: We play a long and open game. Which means reacting and growing stronger though consensus. We document everything, and share it all publicly.

cta.title: Pro-social by constitution
cta.description: The most funded endowments in OL have been created for philanthropic purposes. If we get this right, those DAOs could become among the worlds the largest public endowments.
